colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS BYED TSUL BYIN BYIN BRLABS KYI ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RAB GNAS CHO GA DU MA DANG, ,DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES MTHONG BRGYUD BZHIN, ,RANG GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS BTZUN GZUGS, ,^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, ,'PHAR BA ZHES PA LCAGS MO GLANG GI DBYAR DUS KYI DAGS MA LANG TSO DAR LA BABS PA NA, ,SKYED MOS TSAL GYI BSTI GNAS YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYOR BA'I YI GE PA NI AOR DU SU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS PA SARBA DZA YANTU,, ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
